jmines.model
Class GameBoard

java.lang.Object
  jmines.model.GameBoard

public class GameBoard
extends Object

The class used to do all the business calculations.

Author:
Zleurtor

Constructor Detail

GameBoard

public GameBoard(byte newTilesShape,
                 int newWidth,
                 int newHeight,
                 int newNumberOfMines)
          throws TilesShapeUnsupportedException
Construct a new GameBoard.

Parameters:
newTilesShape - The identifier for the shape of the tiles (TRIANGULAR, SQUARE etc.).
newWidth - The number of columns in the new grid.
newHeight - The number of lines in the new grid.
newNumberOfMines - The number of mines in the new grid.
Throws:
TilesShapeUnsupportedException - If the given tiles shape is not supported (or not yet implemented).

setTilesShape

public final void setTilesShape(byte newTilesShape)
                         throws TilesShapeUnsupportedException
This allows the user to change the shape of the grid tiles.

Parameters:
newTilesShape - The new value for the tiles shape identifier.
Throws:
TilesShapeUnsupportedException - If the given tiles shape identifier is not supported.

newWidth - The new number of columns in the grid.

setNumberOfMines

public final void setNumberOfMines(int newNumberOfMines,
                                   boolean computeFillingRatio)
This allows the user to change the number of mines of the grid.

Parameters:
newNumberOfMines - The new number of mines contained in the grid.
computeFillingRatio - Tell whether or not the number of mines has to be computed using the filling ration of the tiles shape.

setMarksAuthorized

public final void setMarksAuthorized(boolean newMarksAuthorized)
This allows the user to change the authorization for tiles marks.

Parameters:
newMarksAuthorized - the new value for tiles marks authorization.

setFirstOpen

public final void setFirstOpen(boolean newFirstOpen)
This allows to change the first open boolean.

Parameters:
newFirstOpen - true if the next open will be the first, false otherwise.

getMaxMines

public static int getMaxMines(byte shape,
                              float width,
                              float height)
Calculate the maximum number of mines for a grid that has a size equals to (width * height).

Parameters:
shape - The shape of the grid we want the maximum number of mines.
width - The width of the grid we want the maximum number of mines.
height - The height of the grid we want the maximum number of mines.
Returns:
The maximum number of mines for a grid that has a size equals to (width * height).

initializePolygons

public final void initializePolygons(int tilesWidth,
                                     int tilesHeight)
Initialize the cell polygons after a GameBoard initialization for a given tile width and height. The tile is a rectangle that must be inscribed in the polygon.

Parameters:
tilesWidth - The width of the tiles we have to initialize the shapes for.
tilesHeight - The height of the tiles we have to initialize the shapes for.

isContainingMine

public final boolean isContainingMine(int l,
                                      int c)

Returns:

Returns:

open

public final boolean open(Tile tile)
Open the given tile.
This method can fire the defeat event (if the opening tile is containing a mine) or a victory event (if the opening tile is the last non mined tile).
If the tile is the first open and it is containing a mine, then the mine is moved to an empty tile.

Parameters:
tile - The tile want to open.
Returns:
true if the tile is the first open, false otherwise.

checkGameEnd

public final void checkGameEnd(Tile tile)
Check if the game has been won.

Parameters:
tile - The last clicked tile.
